messages.title: The TIME TO DO SOMETHING is NOW!
messages.content: The UK Independence Party is not only the lone voice that opposes Britain’s membership of the EU, we have a full range of common sense policies too.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes Britain’s membership of the EU.
Believes in non-racist non-sectarian approach. First regain control of our borders from the EU then establish who should be allowed to live and work here.

issues.brexitEurope: Opposes Britain’s membership of the EU, calls for a referendum on our future in the EU.
issues.immigration: Believes in a non-racist non-sectarian approach to Immigration Control, regain control of our borders from the EU, then establish who should be allowed to live and work here.
